Who are you?

ABOUT

Hi! Who am I you ask.

I am a college student of Jeju National University, and what-so-ever anyone can say about me(-which is mostly just a friend of theirs named 'Minju' if you've been wondering-). But I'd personally like to consider myself as a constant learner of pretty much anything I find interesting. It's always quite exciting to be a newbie of a field full of enthusiastic people loving what they are into. This is probably why I got into this world of hello-s and stuck to it since. I first found this 'github-blog thing' by KAKAO TRACK class I took last semester and spontaneously decided to create this site full of what I've been doing, and what I'm upto. Hope you like it:).
